thread.section_title: Novotel Xinqiao Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of Novotel Xinqiao Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: MLneo
title: Good location
text:
Location very good, about 2 mins walking distance to metro station. Basically it is just in front of the hotel only. Surrounding hotel there's have 3 shopping malls, it is only walking distance in 5 mins.
You may walking to the Tiananmen Square and also 10 mins walk to Wangfujing walking street, it is so convenience,
Breakfast so so, comfy bed and pillow.
